abstract: Michael Winerip On Education column focuses on Bronx network leader Bob Cohen, who spent decades working at New York City Department of Education; his work consists of visiting schools and helping principals work with their resources; after years in teaching and administration, Cohen knows how to get things done.
snippet: Though he may not always draw praise from school administrators, they rely on Bob Cohen, a Bronx network leader, to take care of important needs.
lead_paragraph: Though he may not always draw praise from school administrators, they rely on Bob Cohen, a Bronx network leader, to take care of important needs.

headline.main: A Bronx Bureaucrat Gets Things Done by Leaving His Desk
headline.print_headline: A Bronx Bureaucrat Gets Things Done by Leaving His Desk
headline.seo: Bronx Bureaucrat Gets Things Done by Leaving His Desk
